comments:
I'm using Eclipse 3.2M1 and latest AJDT 1.3.0 build available from the update site.

I've tried to use some basic refactoring such as inline method from within
advice code (before or around) and got an error "compilation unit must end with
.java".

  Here is the stack trace

I can confirm that the same problem exist with 3.1.1 and current 1.3.0 
snapshot.

I get a similar problem if I try to select a class to test inside the create JUnit TestCase Wizard...

This should be fixed in recent dev builds of AJDT 1.4 for Eclipse 3.2M5, as we register .aj as a "Java-like" extension.

causedBy.message: Compilation unit name must end with .java

traces.message: Compilation unit name must end with .java
